Setting.Name: Core::RocketChat###0001-General
Setting.Description: General configuration of the Rocket.Chat OTOBO extension's behavior.

Setting.Name: Core::RocketChat###0010-Webservice
Setting.Description: Configuration for the Webservice used by the Rocket.Chat extension. Note that this Config does not directly influence the behavior of the Webservice, but is used to (re)create the Webservice by the Rocket.Chat Admin module. Changes made here only affect the Webservice when using the Admin module to apply them.
